item.title: W3-S2 Work, Fluid Pressure and Forces
item.description: 周次: 3 日期: March 11, 2022 节次: 2 In this lecture, we’ll give a brief introduction to the concepts of works and fluid pressures. Many examples will be presented. This lecture covers §6.6 and §6.7. Outline Work Work refers specifically to a force acting on a body and the body

item.title: 写在比赛结束之后
item.description: 比赛结束了，结果没有出线。虽然这是想要的结果，可是没有在竞争中胜出，总是有些不开心。总结其中的得失，没有讲完是最大的遗憾，其实在选题的时候，
